collaborative.soundscapes

collaborative.sounscapes is a net art installation that allows you to create soundscapes with anyone using just this webpage. The piece hopes to empower musicians and non-musicians alike to partake in the kind of community music making that COVID has sought to eliminateâ€¦ only this time on an international scale.
